verbose_text: In addition to tracing studies demonstrating a direct connection from the LPB to the CeC and the lateral part of the CeA (CeL), evidence indicates the following : 1) that 78% of CeC neurons are excited by noxious stimulation in anesthetized rats; 2) that phosphorylated ERK is increased in CeC neurons in response to formalin induced inflammatory pain; and 3) that CeC neurons show robust synaptic potentiation in various pain models.
